entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:50 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -25.4°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -28.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
